name: OGE ENERGY CORP
sampleDescriptions: Murkowski-Cantwell energy bill, S. 1460; drone provisions of Federal Aviation Act Reauthorization bills; and proposals to amend electricity provisions of Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act, H.R. 4476; infrastructure legislation proposals.

Tax reform, H.R. 1, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act; discussion drafts to amend Internal Revenue Code (cost recovery, energy tax credits, dividend taxation; interest on corporate debt deduction, corporate tax rate); taxation of MLPs.  Depreciation of property on Indian Lands (H.R. 1625).

Listing of Lesser Prairie Chicken by FWS under Endangered Species Act;  EPA 111(d) proposal re: Greenhouse gas emissions from existing utility plants and 111(b) re: new utility plants; review of EPA regulations impacting utilities.
Cybersecurity issues.

Cybersecurity issues. H.R. 5239, H.R. 5240.

Proposals to amend electricity provisions of Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act, H.R. 1502 and S. 1760; infrastructure legislation proposals; Appropriations for LIHEAP;  RPS/CES, Clean Air Standard Act, H.R. 2597, S. 1350; S. 1359; energy efficiency; FCC's 6GHz spectrum proposal; Clean Future Act discussion draft; American Energy Innovation Act of 2020, S. 2657; CARES Act, HR. 748;  H.R. 2636, H.R. 2741, H.R. 5518;  HEROES Act, H.R. 6800 provisions relating to electric utilities, including proposals to preempt state retail electric regimes governing disconnection of retail customers (HR 4447).
